prompt_base: 8k cinematic photo, massive muscular giant, pale lavender skin, sharp black mohawk, long braided hair, wide strong jawline, facing camera
feature_prompt: mutated skin texture, subtle oily sheen, source palette preservation, identical color matching, rugged leather grain, realistic muscle definition
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, doll, human skin tone, organic, low quality, blurry face, deformed, small size, (back turned:2.0)
